about_the_game:
In the year 271 A.E., a blood-red rift appeared in the solar system, and a hideously ugly gigantic creature came through, accompanied by countless fleets of insectoids. Humans had no time to figure out the cause of this disaster and were forced to initiate the "Continuation" plan. With the help of several ship captains carrying "Fire Seeds," they piloted starships and performed an emergency jump through a wormhole to an unknown "Noah Universe," thus opening a new chapter of exploring new universes and rebuilding their homes...

Game features:
Automatic idle exploration, discovering unknown planets
Place your ships on autopilot to explore unknown planets, and you can still earn rewards even when you're away from the game. There's also a cool Earth holographic mode for fast exploration.

Assemble elite fleets, combining powerful skills
You can recruit dozens of powerful captains, and by deploying specific captains, you can trigger multi-layer skill chain effects; properly planning your fleet will make your exploration of the universe easier!

Perform cosmic duties, defending human homes
Complete various cosmic duties such as faction wars, repelling insectoids, resource collection and plunder, and mineral secret realms to obtain abundant resources and defend against insectoid invasions.

Open starport expeditions, experiencing more gameplay
Test your fleet's strength through various gameplay such as tournament halls, and undergo characteristic trials; there are also random unknown wormholes waiting for commanders to explore!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10，Windows 11
  • Processor: Core I3
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: 《王牌星舰》是一款以宇宙科幻为题材的挂机类战舰手游，游戏包含卡牌、放置、SLG、Roguelike等多元玩法。在诺亚宇宙，玩家扮演的指挥官可以通过巡航、任务、虫洞、活动等获取强力的星舰、装备、僚机等，以此来逐渐增强舰队的实力；也可以结识朋友，加入阵营，参与星系的资源掠夺；还有更多精彩副本，派遣，挑战等PVE/PVP玩法等待指挥官们的探索体验！
